data.title: Maricopa County Assessor's Office
data.text:
All data and associated costs were approved by the Maricopa County Board of Supervisors on January 16, 2008.

All data will be provided in an ASCII (.dat) or pipe-delimited (.csv) format and includes the entire County. If the requested data file size is small enough, the data may be e-mailed.

The Secured Master Data may be joined with the Assessorâ€™s GIS Data using the APN as the key-join field. The following briefly describes each data set:

Non-Commercial and Commercial

Basic Secured Master Data Set (ST42070)

This is a subset of the standard secured master and includes basic data elements. The fields included are parcel numbers, owner name/address, property address and type of property. Includes shape files.

$100.00 per Book

Enhanced Secured Master Data Set (ST42073)

This is a more detailed subset of the standard secured master and includes a limited number of data elements. The fields included are parcel numbers, owner name/address, property address, type of property, deed information, valuation, property use code, legal class, and rental indicator. Includes shape files.

$200.00 per Book

Premium Secured Master Data Set (ST42076)

This is the most detailed subset of data offered from the standard secured master. The fields included are parcel numbers, owner name/address, type of property, deed information, valuation, rental indicator, basic component data and sales information. This set also includes Basic improvement components of livable square footage, land size, pool size, and construction year. Includes shape files.

$300.00 per Book
